common_errors.cause: Specified path is not a block device
common_errors.solution: Check path is correct. Use /dev/sdX not /dev/sdX1 for disk (vs partition).
Use sudo for detailed info. Or add user to disk group.
List columns: lsblk -h. Common: NAME, SIZE, TYPE, MOUNTPOINT, FSTYPE
List devices: lsblk (no args). Check device exists in /dev/.

common_errors.cause: Cannot read device property (device may be busy or errored)
common_errors.solution: Check device health: dmesg | tail. Device may have I/O errors.

common_errors.cause: No block devices available (container, minimal system)
common_errors.solution: In containers, host block devices may not be visible. Check /dev/ contents.
Install filesystem utils or kernel module. Common: ntfs-3g, exfat-utils.

common_errors.cause: Cannot open block device for reading
common_errors.solution: Check device permissions. Device may be in use exclusively.
